alert.note: Alert for Boone; Hamilton; Marion (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 5:51PM EDT until July 17 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Indianapolis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Marion County in central Indiana... Southeastern Boone County in central Indiana... Southern Hamilton County in central Indiana... * Until 615 PM EDT. * At 551 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Zionsville, or 14 miles northwest of Indianapolis, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Meridian Hills and Williams Creek around 605 PM EDT. Carmel around 610 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Indianapolis, Fishers, Castleton and Geist Reservoir. This includes the following highways... Interstate 65 between mile markers 129 and 130. Interstate 69 between mile markers 200 and 210. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
